::Neody::

Neody nods, stopping near the others and looking around.

"Looks like its about time for a new one, yeah," he says none too 
politely. "You guys mind if I join you?"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: He wasn't talking to Like-Like then anyway.
> 
> ::Cygnar::
>     He looks up the hill.  "Hello sir, are you here for this base?  
I'm 
> afraid you're a bit late but we are planning on forming a new 
Destron base 
> somewhere."
